questions.question_text: What is the primary goal of named entity recognition (NER) in NLP?
questions.options_json: {"A": "Part-of-speech tagging", "B": "Named entity recognition", "C": "Dependency parsing", "D": "Semantic role labeling"}
questions.explanation: Named entity recognition (NER) is a subtask of NLP that aims to identify and categorize named entities in unstructured text, such as people, places, and organizations. This helps in extracting relevant information from text data.
